goals__remit: Cable Europe is a trade asociation that groups all leading broadband cable TV operators and their national associations in Europe. The European TV industry provides digital TV, broadband Internet and telephony services to more than 65 million customers. In September 2006 the association changed its name from ECCA to Cable Europe.  The Association is active since 1955.
